Strops:Blizzard.NAME: Blizzard
DESCRIPTIONS: When discarded, freeze ALL enemies' actions until they lose HP.

Strops:PhantasmalShootingStar.NAME: Phantasmal Shooting Star
DESCRIPTIONS: For this combat, #yAttacks deal #b%.1fx damage. NL #rThis #rpotion #rwill #rdisappear #rat #rthe #rstart #rof #reach #rAct.
For this combat, #yAttacks deal #b%.0fx damage. NL #rThis #rpotion #rwill #rdisappear #rat #rthe #rstart #rof #reach #rAct.

Strops:FrugalPotion.NAME: Frugal Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: At battle start, turn your #yGold #b%d%% as much as before and gain #b%d #yArtifact. NL When discarded, heal #b%d HP (increased #b%d%% by the amount of #yArtifact gained this run).

Strops:GreedyPotion.NAME: Greedy Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: At battle start, turn your #yGold #b%d%% as much as before and gain two #yWeak #b%d time, two #yFrail #b%d time and two #yVulnerable #b%d time. NL When discarded, turn your #yGold #b%d%% as much as before.
